name: PDS1 - Bass diffusion Adoption Curve - 16% Adoption in 2050
description: Using Excel's Goal Seek, we fitted a Bass Diffusion Curve's parameters to fit this adoption for 2050 - 20%. Some parameter constraints were added as guided by the literature on parameter estimations.

name: PDS2 - Bass diffusion Adoption Curve - 30% Adoption in 2050
description: Using Excel's Goal Seek, we fitted a Bass Diffusion Curve's parameters to fit the adoption for 2050 at 30%. Some parameter constraints were added as guided by the literature on parameter estimations.

name: PDS3 - Bass diffusion Adoption Curve - 50% Adoption in 2050
description: Using Excel's Goal Seek, we fitted a Bass Diffusion Curve's parameters to fit the maximum potential we believe for Telepresence - 50% of business air trips. Some parameter constraints were added as guided by the literature on parameter estimations.
